page.title: 16Animals in Brinsley
page.content: One very early morning lots of farm animals such as cows,hens and goats escaped from a farm nearby. No one seemed to know where they came from.They had come down a footpath on King Drive.They had broken down fences and trodden on flowers. Someone who lived on Kings drive had to phone the farmer who dealt with the escaped animals. On Ash grove next door to us there was a swarm of bees living in a tree. A bee keeper from St Johns close took the bees away. When I took my dog for a walk I saw the bees .I ran back home.Every one had to keep their windows closed so that the bees could not get in.
